description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ant Mission - Grab the berries and put them into the colony's food hole before you get squashed by the rain! Features two modes -LCD Watch and 2D Extreme! Can you survive all 10 levels of the storm and get the highest score? Now child-friendly with new unlimited lives Toddler mode!
